group_1.textLeft: ...It's no use!@I just...can't do this...

group_1.textRight: I see...
How unfortunate...
I was certain you'd be able to do it this time.

group_1.textLeft: I mean— just look at that crowd!
If I got swept up in that, I'd never be able to escape!

group_1.textRight: You're exaggerating, Shizuka.
All you'd have to do is go around the store and@buy a few things, right?
Even back in elementary school, I did that a couple@of times when my mom asked me to.
If I can do it, you can do it too!

group_1.textLeft: In other words, I can't even run an errand for@elementary schoolers...

group_1.textRight: Oh my, no one can blame you.
Look— it seems like they're hosting a product@exhibition today.

group_1.textLeft: What's that?

group_1.textRight: In this case...it seems to be a special event@showcasing locally-made products.
So that's why it's super crowded.
We came here in order to get used to city@environments, but...
It seems we chose a bad time to do so.
We'll have other opportunities. For now, let's find@something else to do instead.

group_1.textLeft: Okey dokey!
Hey, why don't you guys try out some food you've@never had before?
I bet something like that could help you get used@to the city!
There has to be an ice cream shop nearby, right?

group_1.textRight: That may be a good idea...@But why ice cream?

group_1.textLeft: Because...[chara:102601:lipSynch_0][wait:1.0][chara:102601:cheek_0][chara:102601:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:102601:motion_100][chara:102601:lipSynch_1]it's really really good?

group_1.textRight: In other words, YOU want ice cream, don't you?

group_1.textLeft: Well, yeah...but the village doesn't have ice cream@either, does it?

group_1.textRight: ...I suppose.
There will be less people there as well.
What do you think, Shizuka?

group_1.textLeft: Okay, let's do that.
I've seen it on TV, and I'm curious what it's like.
So this is the "ice cream" shop...

group_1.textRight: I'll go ahead and buy them!

group_1.textLeft: But...what exactly is "ice cream"?

group_1.textRight: To put it one way...
I'd say it's a sort of confectionery made with a@mixture of sugar, eggs, and milk...?
Sometimes, it's also made from ice.

group_1.textLeft: The more I try to imagine it, the less good@it sounds...

group_1.textRight: Whatever it is, as long as you choose the right flavor,@you'll enjoy it.

group_1.textLeft: So it's a flavored ice candy, huh?

group_1.textRight: I wouldn't describe it like that, but...
Here you go!
Vanilla's a classic, so I went for that one.@You guys okay with that?
Then here you go!

group_1.textLeft: This, erm— how am I supposed to eat this?

group_1.textRight: Watch!
Mmm...[chara:102601:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]yummy!

group_1.textLeft: Alright, let's follow her lead...
Mmm!
[chara:102501:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]It's really good!!!

group_1.textRight: Hooray!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah...ice cream is delicious!

group_1.textRight: Shizuka, slow down, if you eat it too fast—

group_1.textLeft: [chara:102501:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Urk?!
Oh no, my head— it feels like it's splitting open—

group_1.textRight: I warned you...

group_1.textLeft: Did I catch a cold from eating chilly food@too quickly...?
But I've never had this much pain from a cold!

group_1.textRight: Hey, calm down...
I'm sure this is her first time experiencing this@sensation...
The pain must be unimaginable.

group_1.textLeft: I knew it was too good to be true...
So this is what city candy is like!
